bondInfo(uint256).notice: returns data about a bond type

bondPriceInUSD(uint256).notice: converts bond price to DAI value

bondTerms(uint256).notice: returns terms for a bond type

debtDecay(uint256).notice: amount to decay total debt by

debtRatio(uint256).notice: calculate current ratio of debt to QUAS supply

payoutFor(uint256,uint256).notice: payout due for amount of treasury value

payoutForAmount(uint256,uint256).notice: payout due for amount of token

setTerms(uint256,uint256,bool,uint256,ui.notice: set minimum price for new bond

standardizedDebtRatio(uint256).notice: debt ratio in same terms for reserve or liquidity bonds
